title: PLEASE FIX THIS Skirmisher's Sabre BUG... ITS KILLS TRYN DURING ULT
body:
Whilst playing Tryndamere i died a total of 6 times during ult..  when went on cooldown. 2 times i thought maybe because of the 0.5 sec activation delay. but the other 4 of them were 2 secs after the ult as i activated to test it out. This got me to playing a few games with tryn and i noticed it was always Warwick with his  Skirmisher's Sabre ult combo that kills me through ult.. 

PLZ RITO FIX ASAP
TY XD

replies.body: Please don't fix it, it's finally some %%%%ing counterplay to his ult. In fact I support it sticking around just so no one plays that %%%%ing champ anymore.

It's not really what we call a counterplay, it's simply his ulti not functioning as intended.

If you want some legit counterplay to it, prob nerf is the only way to go.

> 
> If you want some legit counterplay to it, prob nerf is the only way to go.

I don't mind what it is, as long as he can %%%%ing die instead of walking through my team ulting and 3 hitting my ADC's and support with no counterplay.

Yeah but you're supposed to save your bursts or DoT until he runs out...

But oh well.

> Yeah but you're supposed to save your bursts or DoT until he runs out...
> 
> But oh well.

Yeah but 5s of not taking damage while still criting 800's. And dont say to kite him as his spin is on a 3s cooldown ,and he has a slow. lol

This has been known for well over a week or so.

**DON'T PLAY TRYNDAMERE THIS PATCH**

Actually, I think his ult is bugged in general.

One game, Tryn dived me, pressed his ult, and still died with 3 seconds still left.

No one had smited him before-hand either.
hmm. I never actually died like that when a dove a few times, just when I got smited Ult WW Combo.. but maybe it is bugged.

Don't worry, they are changing Skirmishes Sabre so it is damage over time proc'd by basic attacks!
So Skirmisher's Sabre will kill you legitimately at the end of the Tryndamere ult.
I noticed that when playing kha'zix jg, hit them with the smite and ignore his ult it is a bug, but for once we have an advantage over trynd pls don't change it

but dont you think its a tad unfair.. an item that most jng get that shuts down the meaning of a Champion..

like tryn is known for his crits and his undying rage.. that smite already reduces 20% damage.. but to say that it should neglect the ult is kinda harsh?
You should have spammed all chat with vile words and curses, that would have fixed it for you.
